column4: Using debian hardy - connected a usb-printer (HP 1020) Cups finds the printer and drivers, and everything is just fine - but I can't print. The very first time I did it, I sent a test-print. The printer was out of paper- I didn't find any paper and later when I tried to print again, nothing happens
did you try hitting the "load paper" button on the printer?
There aren't any load paper button
could it have anything to do with permissions - I'm new to ubuntu - been on debian before
